headline: Brown & Brown Inc. (BRO) Consolidates Business Segments Following RSC Topco Acquisition
summary: Brown & Brown, Inc. (NYSE:BRO) is one of the best stocks to invest in, according to billionaire George Soros. On August 22, the company confirmed the reorganization of its business segment following the acquisition of RSC Topco. The company has already consolidated its Programs and Wholesale Brokerage segments into a new Specialty Distribution segment. Consequently, […]
